name: UpdateEnumOption
description:
Update an existing enum option in Asana custom fields.

This tool is used to update an existing enum option in Asana custom fields. It's necessary to have the 'custom_fields:write' scope. Locked custom fields can only be updated by the user who locked them.

parameters.name: enum_option_gid
parameters.description: The globally unique identifier for the enum option to update.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the enum option.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: Provide a list of properties to include in the response, beyond the default set.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: resource_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the resource as a string.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier of the resource, as a string.

parameters.name: resource_type
parameters.description: The base type of the resource, specified as a string. This is necessary for updating the enum option.

value_schema.description: The base type of this resource.

parameters.name: enum_option_name
parameters.description: The name of the enum option to be updated.

value_schema.description: The name of the enum option.

parameters.name: enum_option_color
parameters.description: The color of the enum option. Defaults to 'none' if not provided.

value_schema.description: The color of the enum option. Defaults to `none`.

parameters.name: pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true to receive the response in a pretty-printed format. Increases response time and size, useful for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: enum_option_enabled
parameters.description: Indicates if the enum option is selectable for the custom field. Provide 'true' to make it selectable, 'false' otherwise.

value_schema.description: Whether or not the enum option is a selectable value for the custom field.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.
